headline: How To Get The Best Seat On A Plane
short_description: If you've ever traveled on a commercial jet, you probably know to avoid picking the middle seat in a row of three. If you purchase a last-minute ticket or you didn't select a seat before check-in, you might not have any other choice but to sit between two strangers on a long transcontinental flight, but assuming you do have your pick of where to sit, it's worth spending a few minutes to make sure you're getting the most bang for your buck.

headline: How America 'Won' Its Independence 2 Years After July 4, 1776
short_description: I'm sure several of you are shaking your heads, wondering if I got the title wrong.  But while American political figures officially declared their independence on July 4, 1776, winning it was another matter.  And that came on a hot day in June, instead of a cold day in December.
authors: John A. Tures, ContributorPolitical science professor, LaGrange College in Georgia
text: How America 'Won' Its Independence 2 Years After July 4, 1776 I'm sure several of you are shaking your heads, wondering if I got the title wrong.  But while American political figures officially declared their independence on July 4, 1776, winning it was another matter.  And that came on a hot day in June, instead of a cold day in December.

headline: Living in a Diaper Desert
short_description: Much attention has been focused on changing food deserts for the sake of the nation's health. Let's not forget, though, that good food is not the only thing a child needs. No community will be a healthy place for a child to grow up until all a baby's basic needs are accessible and affordable.
authors:
Joanne Samuel Goldblum, Contributor
CEO, National Diaper Bank Network
text: Living in a Diaper Desert Much attention has been focused on changing food deserts for the sake of the nation's health. Let's not forget, though, that good food is not the only thing a child needs. No community will be a healthy place for a child to grow up until all a baby's basic needs are accessible and affordable.

headline: Mindfulness as a Path to Personal Sustainability

President, Power Living Enterprises, Inc.
